word: If the device uses PoE from existing network equipment, it is probably already on that network.
If it uses PoE from an injector, simply ensure that the Ethernet cable going INTO the injector is connected
(at the other end) to a router or switch:
If the device is powered via USB, just plug an Ethernet cable from your network's router or switch into the device.
The device needs to be on the same network as the building's ButterflyMX panel.
device and the panel need to share the same subnet:
Each ECS Device needs to be assigned a static IP,
